title: Federal Budget 2025-26 at a glance
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 10 (APP):The Federal Government on Tuesday presented a budget of Rs 17.573 trillion for the fiscal year 2025-26.
Following is the breakup of resources and expenditures:
Tax Revenue (FBR) – Federal Consolidated Fund: 14,131
II. Non-Bank Borrowing (NSSs & Others) – Public Account: 2,874
III. Net External Receipts – Fed. Consolidated Fund:     106
VI. Bank Borrowing (T-Bills, PIBs, Sukuk) – Fed. Consolidated Fund: 3,435
V. Privatization Proceeds – Fed. Consolidated Fund: 87
TOTAL EXPENDITURE (A+B) Rs. In Billion: 17,573
Grants and Transfers to Provinces & Others: 1,928
